content:
蓝拳圣使

Lucky Straight Punch 直拳冲击
Smasher 虎袭
Second Uppercut 勾拳追击
Spirit Fists 拳气
Will Driver 意念驱动
Combat Mastery 拳技精通
Technical Mastery 技巧精通
Cancel - Lucky Straight Punch 强制 直拳冲击
Ducking Straight Punch 俯冲直拳
Ducking Body Blow 俯冲腹拳
Ducking Uppercut 俯冲翔拳
Ducking Dash 俯冲
Cancel - Ducking Dash 强制 俯冲
Divine Crusher 圣拳锤击
Quick Parry 急速闪避
Sidewind 瞬拳
Cancel - Sidewind 强制 瞬拳
Exquisite Combo 圣拳连击
Cancel - Exquisite Combo 强制 圣拳连击
Sway 摆动
Cancel - Sway 强制 摆动
Sacred Counter 神圣反击
Machine Gun Jab 刺拳猛击
Cancel - Machine Gun Jab 强制 刺拳猛击
Chopping Hammer 破碎之锤
Twister of Judgment 天谴飓风
Heavenly Combo 神圣组合拳
Shadow Clone 幻影化身
Double Shadow 双重幻影
Hurricane 'n' Roll 急速飓风拳
Megaton Jab 刺拳狂击
Infernal Combo 破混组合拳
Dry Out 干涸之泉
Big Bang Punch 泯灭神击
